entities.description: Use of substances such as tobacco, alcohol, or drugs.
Issues related to mental health, including disorders or general psychological well-being.
Mental health or substance use treatment received by the individual.
Demographic information of the respondent including age, gender, and socioeconomic status.
Response provided by the individual in the survey.
Indicates whether the individual resides in a rural area.
Highest level of education attained by the individual.

relationships.description: Links the survey response to data on substance use.
Links the survey response to data on mental health issues.
Indicates whether the respondent received treatment for substance use or mental health issues.
Links the survey response to the demographic information of the respondent.
Indicates whether the respondent resides in a rural area.
Links the demographics entity to the education level of the respondent.
